ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright, heres some news for you. Go to Bastion of thunder. Time the popping of nameds during offpeak hours. Kill the 4 nameds. You are bound to get at least 1
ygData.messageBody:
Message
Alright, heres some news for you.
 
Go to Bastion of thunder. Time the popping of nameds during offpeak hours. Kill the 4 nameds. You are bound to get at least 1 rune and some spectrals and some other neat items. Sometimes it drops a 60-100k monk staff for example and the runes you should be able to sell for 20k a piece if you need cash. Repeat this a few days in a row.
 
I can name maybe 20 of these places if youre into farming shit (Normally I dont cause cash is mostly worthless anyway, you cant buy the stuff you want its not on the market but if you want cash its doable).
 
In that farming session you will prolly get 1-2 aa while you are at it aswell, but this is just a bonus.
-----Original Message-----
From: Chirrichela Lomarcan [mailto:yssario@...]
Sent: den 11 mars 2003 13:42
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur

It's kinda funny how many people will claim they can make 100k in one night, but have ya ever noticed they won't say how or where?  Suuuuuuure ya do!
----- Original
On one good evening of exp you can make 100k. (if you are lucky). On one
normal evening of exp you should make at least 500-1kpp if you choose that
type of spot (4h or so of playing).


Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
